overview:
Martin Buske founded Mitfahrzentrale.de , Europe’s first online carpooling service, in 1998. The service was aqcuired by carpooling.com in 2010. Actually he is founder of Mobile Location GmbH, a SaaS Mobile Marketing Management solution provider.

He founded in 2009 the logistic service onewaygo, which helps car rental companies to reduce their costs. Onewaygo was sold to a car rental company in 2012.
